item.description: Forage through the sweet streets of Boston on Tuesday, July 14 with the Emerging Professionals Network. Put your detective cap on, lace up those sneaks, nab a camera phone and get ready to outwit your peers on clues concerning architecture and the city. Teams of five or six will be formed at 6:00 pm at The Architects Building (52 Broad Street) before departing on their missions. Afterwards, we'll grab appetizers and drinks from the cash bar at a secret spot (shh! It's a clue!). RSVP to rsvp@architects.org with "Scavenger hunt" in the subject line.
item.how_to_find_us: It starts here! We'll meet inside.
item.name: BSA Scavenger Hunt!
